attributes.title: Minecraft
attributes.description:
The achievement hunter lads hop into Minecraft Xbox 360 edition for the first time. Everyone except Gav was playing this for the first time ever. 
Be sure to stay until the end for the thrilling conclusion to their first adventure!

attributes.title: Minecraft Part 2
attributes.description: Join the Achievement Hunter lads (Geoff, Jack, Michael, Gav, Ray and Joel) as they team up to try and get the On a Rail achievement. Watch your ears... shit gets loud.

attributes.title: Minecraft Part 3 - PLAN G
attributes.description:
Geoff, Gavin, Michael, Jack and Ray explore the newly completed achievement city.
Don't press the button.

attributes.title: Minecraft Part 4
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff, Gavin, Michael, and Ray return to Minecraft once more as they race for first in an epic contest created by Geoff. Who will win Who will fail Who will Michael berate and insult the entire time Ok, that's an easy one.

attributes.title: Minecraft Part 5
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff, Gavin, Michael, and Ray return to Minecraft once again to race to see who can build a Diamond Pickaxe first. Tensions are high and friendships might be broken.Joe Pesci not included.

attributes.title: Minecraft Part 6
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Michael, and Ray compete to see who can build and enter a Nether portal first. Michael also shows you how to unlock every achievement in Minecraft in 10 seconds flat.

attributes.title: Minecraft Part 7
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Michael, and Ray return for the dramatic conclusion of the quest to see who can enter The Nether first.Oh yeah, Geoff found all of his stuff too.

attributes.title: Minecraft Part 8
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff, Gavin, Michael, Ray and Jack race to build the infamous Tower of Pimps!

attributes.title: Minecraft Part 9
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: This is it! The thrilling conclusion to build the tower of pimps. WHO WILL RISE TO THE TOP! Watch the video. Now.

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 10 - With Geoff, Gav, Michael, Ray and Jack
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff and Gavin take the boys through a special Wipeout course in Minecraft. The winner gets... THE TOWER OF PIMPS.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft Episode 10 - With Geoff, Gav, Michael, Ray and Jack

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 11 - With Geoff, Gav, Michael, Ray and Jack
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Jack, Michael and Ray have each complete a blind run of Gav and Geoff's Wipeout course. In this episode, they try to improve their times. Watch them in the thrilling and explosive ending!
attributes.display_title: Minecraft Episode 11 - With Geoff, Gav, Michael, Ray and Jack

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 12 - With Geoff, Gav, Michael, Ray and Jack
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: This week the Lads travel to the bottom of Achievement City for the ultimate PvP battle. Last Man Standing! Due to the dark and spooky nature of this Let's Play, some shots have been brightened up so you can see what is going on a little bit better than our players could.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft Episode 12 - With Geoff, Gav, Michael, Ray and Jack

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 14
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff, Gav, Michael, Jack and Ray finish the quest to retrieve the Tower of Pimps. This episode contains all kinds teaming and scheming. And yelling.

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 15
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff, Gav, Michael and Ray deal with the latest issues in Achievement City. I'm beginning to think these guys should get a better security system.

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 16
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Gav, Michael, Ray and even Jack finally shows up to try and get Geoff down from his lava-leaking sky fortress.

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 17
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: This is it! The final part of the mission for Gav, Michael, Ray and Jack to take the tower of pimps from Geoff. Who will succeed FIND OUT NOW!

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 18
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: This week, Geoff, Jack, Michael, Gavin and Ray are joined by Caleb as they play Axial Matt's Mineball map. Beware, headphone users, this 3 on 3 action gets LOUD.

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 19
attributes.caption: minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Gavin, Michael and Ray all start with a different piece of the tower of pimps. Who will combine and construct their way to victory

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 20
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff, Gav, Jack, Michael and Ray take on the Labyrinth. Who will be able navigate its dark and treacherous hallwaysShout out to SuperNinja5506 for making the map!

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 21
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Gavin, Michael and Ray drop into a new world in the new 1.8 update. Everything is different! RUN!

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 22
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: This week, Geoff, Jack, Michael, Gavin and Ray are joined by Caleb as they play community member AxialMatt's Grifball map. Will Geoff's team take another victory or will Jack have his revenge Let the games begin!

attributes.title: Minecraft 23 - Hunger Games
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: In by far the most requested minecraft let's play, Geoff, Jack, Michael, Gavin, Ray and Caleb fight to the death in the Achievement Hunter Hunger Games. Map made by StrikingHobbit

attributes.title: Minecraft 24
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff, Gavin, Jack, Michael, Ray and Ryan go head to head in a capture the flag match. Except due to the lack of flags in minecraft, they are capturing the TOWER OF PIMPS!

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 25
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: This week, Geoff, Jack, Gavin, Michael and Ray continue their quest to find a stronghold.

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 26
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: In this week's gripping episode, the boys try and grow a melon underground. This is Minecraft at it's most useless. Watch Geoff, Jack, Michael, Gavin and Ray do literally nothing useful for 30 minutes!

attributes.title: Minecraft 27
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: This week we're back in Achievement City (yay!) and Geoff, Jack, Michael, Gavin, Ray and Ryan get their pig on.

attributes.title: Minecraft 28
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Sorry guys, but Jack, Geoff, Gavin, Michael, Ray, Caleb and Ryan have gone fishin this week.

attributes.title: Minecraft 29
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Michael, Gavin, Ray and Caleb take on THE WALLS. Will bromance prevail Thanks to JusticeReddNeck for making the map on xbox.

attributes.title: Minecraft Episode 30
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Michael, Gavin and Ray start a new world (AchievementVille) in the 1.9 update and go on a quest to find a Mooshroom!

attributes.title: Minecraft - Episode 31
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: The gang compete in an epic challenge to dye every color of wool first. As always, dignity and the Tower of Pimps are on the line.
